article_title: Capping The Tax Exclusion Will Not Destroy Employer Health Insurance

article_metadata.description: BY JOSEPH ANTOS - The limit would encourage employers to seek lower-cost plan options, but would not drive employers to offer only low-cost plans.
article_metadata.author: Capital Flows
